thread.title: Dirty shoebox room with too short, broken bed
thread.title_full: Dirty shoebox room with too short, broken bed - Review of Vieux Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mcathmu
title: Dirty shoebox room with too short, broken bed
text: The room was very tiny, with just enough space for a single bed- which was too tiny for my average height and broken (sagging in the middle- really unconfortable).The floors were dirty, with a couple of used napkins under my bed, indicating the room wasnÂ´t cleaned prior to my arrival. The bathroom floors had hair from different people (many colours). Basic french breakfast served in the rooms only (there is no dining area in the hotel) with one croissant, a baguette with butter and jam, coffee and orange juice.
